cause.description:
Diabetes affects a lot of people...facts:
Total: 20.8 million people—7 percent of the population—have diabetes.
Diagnosed: 14.6 million people
Undiagnosed: 6.2 million people
Prevalence of Diagnosed Diabetes in People Aged 20 Years or Younger, United States, 2005 About 176,500 people aged 20 years or younger have diabetes. This group represents 0.22 percent of all people in this age group.
About one in every 400 to 600 children and adolescents has type 1 diabetes.
1. Diabetes needs a cure
cause.name: Diabetes Needs A Cure
